name: Project Bounty Hunters
description:
A top-down multiplayer roguelite action RPG where you and your team must cooperate and prepare to defeat a powerful boss at the end of each level.
You'll earn money to buy power-ups (in the form of cards) at designated shopping locations, which can be used to increase your team's chances of slaying said monster.
At the start of each dungeon, you'll be told what kind of enemies (including the main one) you'll encounter. So choose your cards wisely, as the power-ups are not shared and the merchant only has one card of each one. A good team composition will surely make completing your main objective easier!

Team members:

  • Fabián Diaz
  • Gaspar Ricci
  • Felipe Torralba

Blue Penguin Games. An assignment for CC5409 "Multiplayer Video Game Workshop"
